title: Chicken Nasi Biryani
ingredients: ['150g long-grain or basmati rice, washed and drained', '400ml chicken stock', '1/2 teaspoon turmeric powder', '1 good knob butter', '2 cloves garlic, chopped', '1 big onion, sliced', '1 thin slice root ginger', '1 heaping dessertspoon curry powder', '2 cloves', '1 small cinnamon stick', '2 chicken drumsticks', '1/2 teaspoon salt', 'handful chopped fresh coriander']
